issue.title: C++: Represent boolean array data in bit-packed form
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-37](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-37). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is not explicit in the Arrow specification (we should make this concrete), but has the additional benefit of making code for null bitmaps and boolean arrays interchangeable.
